website_summaries.verdict: Despite longevity concerns, this good-looking RFID-blocking wallet is a reasonable choice for consumers who like the look of leather in an animal-free construction.
pros: Constructed of material that has a leather look, but isn't made with animal-based materials
Has feminine lines that compliment women's fashions
Available in more than 20 fashionable colors
Plenty of pockets and a removable wrist strap round out its feature set
cons: Snap closure won't shut if you over-stuff the pockets
Not quite as durable as authentic leather

customer_reviews.title: good good good!
customer_reviews.text: Best passport holder I bought this passport holder for a trip in May, but I have used it for a week already! It did the job perfectly, just as advertised, the wallet holds passport, pen, cards, boarding pass, receipts or coupons, cellphone (without case), license, fits everything I need inside. If you are a traveler and travel around every year, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Oujin

customer_reviews.title: Safe and so cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute wallet! I love the beautiful color, it is exactly as picture. It holds my cellphone, 7-8 cards, passport, pen, key, all pockets are perfect organizing. The pocket is a little tight so you won’t worry money or cards fall out when you open it, it’s safe to protect what in the wallet. I will definitely order more for my family, it seems some colors are for man, I will ask my brother which color he prefers, I think navy blue is great but I will check with him before ordering. Worth buy!ng for.
customer_reviews.author: Yang Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Convenient for traveling I have traveled with the wallet last month, I love it. It holds different types of currency, kinds of tickets and stubs. It's thin but has plenty of room. I love the material, it's not soft leather but it still keeps cute design with no bulky when full organized. The hardware looks great as well. Its rfid feature makes traveling comfortable as all cards are secure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s my favorite color wallet
customer_reviews.text: I like the rose gold stuff, and this rose gold wallet is beautiful. It’s small but has enough space for everything I need. I have 5 bank /credit cards, my ID, passport and cash inside and it still laid flat. It was able to fold my iphone 7 Plus inside and it snapped closed. What I like most is that has a wrist strap and the wallet became a perfect little cluth for nights out.
customer_reviews.author: Qiuyi Xie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional - Easy to DIY/Personalize!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wallet fits my stuff for a trip abroad. Will update when I get back to see how it does but so far it's a beautiful and sturdy wallet. I love the wristlet part which is primarily why I bought it. It was easy to add a sticker that looks like an embellishment if you're into DIY like I am and want to add a touch of personalization. Any sticker will do, but the glitter spiderweb did it for me 😊.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Lodz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY! Great for everything!
customer_reviews.text: I got this wallet as a gift from ZOPPEN just because I purchased another passport wallet from them. HOW AMAZING THIS TRAVEL WALLET IS?!! Its convenient and a high quality one. I took a picture of the wallets I got from them it clearly shows you how beautiful the quality of the product. ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amdcleofas

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Well made wallet with all the necessary compartments. I love the wrist band feature to help keep it secure when on the airport security line. I’ve bought from this company before and my stuff always hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Kawochka

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got the navy colored travel wallet (pics included). Overall, I’m very satisfied with this product! It's primary purpose is for travel and can fit my passport fully without problems in addition to other cards and, if I had one on hand, the plane ticket. This can be used not just for travels but for personal use at home without use of a purse as well! It’s big enough to be considered a wristlist! Great purchase. Seems durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lei

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Magnificence!
customer_reviews.text: I have literally never been as excited to receive or use a wallet as I was with this one! For as big as it is, (ie my first wallet too big to fit in my pocket) it’s not bulky or unwieldy. It doesn’t feel cheap or like it would thread or break soon. And they are soo pretty! The pictures are of it traveling with me today! I’m so glad to have found this wallet and I’m simply in love with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jada Royer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I am able to keep all of my important things in this wallet on my international trips - passport, cards, IDs, money, and phone. I even stick a piece of gum in the SD slot in case I need it. It keeps everything organized and in one place, and I am not worried about any information being stolen. I have even carried this as a clutch to nice dinners (I ordered the black so it is classy looking). The only thing I don't like is that there is not a place for my chap-stick if I want to carry this as a clutch by itself. Still trying to figure out where I can stick some...
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for an international trip and it was great. It held everything I needed and was a great value for the money. It's a bit larger than I prefer for every day use but I still might switch over. Great value for the price and I liked that this version included the wrist strap. I bought a black one but I may be getting this in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My go to wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of brand named wallets, but this is my favorite. I bought the previous version and it surprisingly has stayed in pretty good condition after using it for an entire year. Sometimes I use it on it's own or carry it in my purse. I purchased this new version because there are more card slots and a wrist strap. After receiving the wallet, it is a little longer than the old one but it still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: M. O.

customer_reviews.title: Handy wristlet that travels well.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy, stylish wallet/wristlet. Doesn’t holds ton, but will hold essentials hot travel. You know what need I. The airport/train station/ferry etc. Those important documents for ID, some money/credit cards and a ticket. Thus will hold all of that. It will hold an iPhone 8+ (without a case) in one of its pockets. I don’t travel with my iPhone without a case, so I use that pocket for my passport. The color is stylish. Mine is a rose gold. (Matches my phone). Once I’m on my way or back at the hotel, I can very easily stash the wallet in my book bag or suitcase. It doesn’t take up much room at all.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMarTay

customer_reviews.title: Efficient wallet for travel
customer_reviews.text: I got this wallet to use while flying. There was a time that I was flying frequently with a toddler and I needed an efficient wallet to make things easier. It's worked well for me, and actually became my primary wallet for a time. I got a lot of comments from people on how much they liked it. Turns out it was both efficient and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Good quality travel wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, plenty of storage without being bulky, travel wallet. It holds my passport, IPhone 6 Plus, credit cards and necessary travel documents. It fit nicely into a slim across body purse and it comes with a wrist clip if case you wanted to use it on its own. I couldn’t be happier. This exceeded all my expectations and I loved all the colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe58

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of this, which I've always loved. This version has a wrist strap, which was the only thing missing from the old version in my opinion. It holds all my important cards when I travel, and being protective is a great bonus. It's great for travel, or as a wedding accessory when I don't want to carry my full purse! I love this wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Clindsay1213

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Although this wallet has a lot of compartments that you need when traveling, I thought it was too bulky. I used it on my trip to Europe this summer and found it too bulky to be taking in/out of your crossbody bag. If I would have had a larger purse I think it shouldnt have been a problem; however, when travelling i like to be minimal cross body and felt it took a large portion of the bag making it difficult for camera etc.
customer_reviews.author: Elcira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a large wallet/small clutch
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that I could travel with or use in my laptop bag (like for going out to lunch at work without needing to take my whole laptop bag, or carry a purse and my laptop bag). I can fit my iPhone 11 (with a case) in the section of this wallet that is designed for the passport, and feel that this will work great as a little clutch when running out during the work day. When I travel, I intend to use this as my primary wallet that way it can hold my passport. The added little handle is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: MarrE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to the Turks and Caicos, and I absolutely LOVED it! I'm actually thinking about purchasing it in other colors. It has held up well, and the removable wristlet strap is a great feature. I was able to fit my iPhone 7 Plus in one of the inside pockets when it did NOT have the case on it. It fits great without the case, but it doesn't fit at all with the case on. The wallet stays closed when buckled. I have no issues at all with this wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Like this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this wallet yet, but opened up the package. At first glance I feel I am going to really like it. I can see where you can prob put multiple credit cards in each slot, there is a lot of room in there. The pockets are not stiff and tight like I was afraid they might be. I put the picture of it next to my purse which is an odd periwinkle color to show you the color choice. I’m excited to use this wallet for my upcoming trip.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Evans

customer_reviews.title: Not Really A Passport Holder
customer_reviews.text: This Is an attractive and well-made wallet. I ordered it in purple. It’s probably more useful at home then for traveling which is what I ordered it for. I was hoping for more long time slots to hold multiple currencies and it really is not a passport holder. Too many slots for cards. No one travels with that many credit cards. I would prefer that it had a slot for a passport, and several slots for multiple currencies to keep them separate and organized with fewer credit card slots.
customer_reviews.author: LambiePie

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is a great wallet for holding travel document essentials. However the picture shows that it also hold a phone, which was a selling point for me, it sadly does not. Even without a case the phone does not fit because that portion does not expand. The only place to really put any cash would be the zippered part, which is a minor nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: e.k

customer_reviews.title: Finally upgraded my wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the textured black color. It makes it sophisticated enough to use for fancier outings. I like that it has a place holder for a pen because traveling abroad requires a bit of paperwork. It doesn’t have too much space for cards/plastic, and since I am using this as my everyday wallet, the limited space stops me from hoarding gift cards. Finally, the wristlet is a nice addition. Even if it doesn’t secure around my wrist, I can at least hold onto the strap instead of the bigger body.
customer_reviews.author: Desarae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Ver. 4 a couple years ago for my international travels and loved that it kept everything I needed in one place. I’m so excited to use this Ver. 5 with the wristlet and larger spaces to hold more items if necessary. Beautiful wallet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great travel wallet - makes getting through airports so much easier
customer_reviews.text: Really cute (lots of compliments) and practical wallet. Has made it so much easier to travel and can just hold it in hand as go through airport security. Love the RFID blocking feature as that is so critical today especially with travel to large cities, etc. I find it a little bulky with my phone in it but that's my preference. Works great with everything else including passport and travel tickets, etc.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using a zip up passport wallet that had plenty of room for itineraries and boarding passes, and a separate travel wallet. This allows me to carry both passport and travel documents, and typical wallet stuff (cash, cards, coins) all in one convenient place. It's also easier to open during check-in to grab my passport than the zippered one was. Highly recommend for travelling!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Royal

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't expect much beyond a basic utilitarian travel wallet when I ordered this, but I have to say that it looks and feels way more high-end than the price-point would suggest. The design is clever and efficient, with plenty of room for all the essentials in one convenient place, without sacrificing aesthetic. This might become my new everyday wallet. Definitely recommend this if you're in the market for one!
customer_reviews.author: Kara C

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you won’t regret it. Allows for organized and hassle free travel.
customer_reviews.text: I took this t Europe for 3 weeks. Traveling all over between trains and planes, the best purchase I’ve ever made. It held my passport, ID, call my cards and currency along with my metro and boarding passes. I also had a place for my receipts and the best part was there was a designated spot for a pen which I needed more than I ever thought I would. It’s also pretty water resistant and keeps things from getting demagnetized by your phone. Oh and the card doesn’t get stuck in the slots, slides out easily when you need it but not so easy that you might drop anything on accident. It’s perfect. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Serra3424

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for holding Euros, my plane tickets, passport, ID and credit cards on a recent overseas trip. I was able to clip this to the inside of a larger bag while on flights and in airports for more more security. I ended up many coins (1 and 2 euro coins) so it became a little heavy, but it held all that without any indication a seam would split or the zipper was pulling apart.
customer_reviews.author: 3boyz3Madison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Passport Holder/Wallet! Is is the perfect size and holds just exactly what I need. I love that it has dividers so that I can separate my large bills from the small ones, and there are just the right amount of card holders for me. I DO have my Passport in it, although I was not use to carrying it all the time, only when I travel, I like that I always have it now. Thank you for a great product and the variety of colors to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M. Robinett

customer_reviews.title: Best travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: I am a flight attendant and use this wallet all the time. It is my favorite wallet in general but I love using it for work. It holds everything I need perfectly and makes it easier to find stuff when I need to. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a travel wallet. Also the customer service is amazing and they are quick to respond.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Handy travel partner!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a cruise to Mexico. Held all of my necessary things, i.e. phone, cards, passport, a pen, cash, and my boarding card. It's surprisingly small for how much it holds. It held up very well with sand and the like. I didn't really get it wet, so I can't attest to how it does there, but would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Wish there were more color options.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if the RFID works yet but my husband and I have been stationed overseas since August and have had our cards skimmed 4 times. So I ordered this wallet hoping it will stop it from happening again and it does fit both of my passports so that’s nice! I just wish there were more color options. Another company that had the same wallet had it in dark green and I really wanted it but the reviews said it wasn’t RFID safe. So I settled for this brand. We will see if it actually works.
customer_reviews.author: MamaD

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Space ~ For Cards & Travel Items
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great wallet, but NOT a great travel wallet!!! As a frequent traveler, International and domestic, I try to eliminate and minimize what I carry, but this doesn't fit that many cards, cash, coins, pen, nor passport together, otherwise it won't shut. It's really cute looking, on the outside though and gets lots of compliments, but that's NOT why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: John and Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Problem solver
customer_reviews.text: Really great design with places for cards money etc. I have many cards that I may not ever use but still want to keep together without a lot of bulk or weight. This works, but they are tripled up in the slots bc there are enough slots. With more slots I would give it a five. Very attractive and sleek
customer_reviews.author: smt

customer_reviews.title: Great product, have been traveling for the past 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, have been traveling for the past 2 weeks with it and it has been extremely handy. Only thing I would mention is that the protection for reading cards and passport are a sleeve, for a credit card not a big deal but for the passport it would mean taking out the sleeve to then take out the passport. I opted to cut open the sleeve length wise so I could just slid the passport in and out without taking out the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is sturdy and reliable. It hold all of the necessary paperwork I needed to travel. Only downside was the cellphone slot. I own a Galaxy Note 9, so the space for the phone is way too small, so I did end up returning it. But if you own a smaller phone than me, I highly recommend the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This travel wallet is so cute! The color is amazing - just like the photo (I got the “yellow brown” it’s a perfect golden color). Seems to be very good quality for a great price. Edit to add: I used it exclusively while on my honeymoon and it was Incredible! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: StephS

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Hunter Green Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is perfect for travel and even has a little pocket for your passport. It is good quality for an even better price and the color is amazing. There are plenty of spaces for credit cards and your ID. This is my second wallet from Zoppen and the first one lasted for years.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel wallet! I bought it for my trip to Thailand due to the RFID blocking feature. It fit my passport easily along with my credit cards, ID and cash. I liked that it has a spot for my SIM card and a pen. Now that I’m home, I actually use it for my everyday wallet too.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This is what I needed at the time...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wallet! I was looking for a wallet that would hold my phone, cards/cash, and room for keys, and this wallet fits that need. I love the snap closure, easy-access for cards/cash, and large pockets for phone and other small items. I like slimmer wallets like this (makes me stay organized), so I'm happy with it. The strap is uncomfortable on the wrist if your wallet is full and have heavy keys, so I would just carry it like a small clutch under my arm. I am noticing some wear-n-tear by the key ring, and my guess it because my keys are heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as a thank you gift for friend because she has decided to accompany me across the ocean. She Loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Given as Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift to a friend that is retiring and planning to travel quite a bit. It came nicely packaged, so great out of box experience. Appears to be a nice value for the cost. As I am not the one using it, can't coment further.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY LAVANIER

customer_reviews.title: Cute, But NOT RFID Blocking.
customer_reviews.text: These are not RFID blocking. They’re super cute wristlets, but I bought two of them and tested both at several different places and they do not block the RFID frequency from my cards. I specifically bought them for the RFID blocking for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: A. Charron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great size. My iPhone XS Max fits in it. Love the wallet strap! It fits all my CC AND DEBIT. LOVE THE POCKET FOR THE DL EASY ACCESS. THE COLOR IS PERFECT! Can’t wait to test it out traveling and just daily use! Deff worth the price the quality exceeded my expectations- I was worried since the price is so low but it’s incredible! Also it comes with a packing list which is so cute!! 10/10 would recommend 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations, extremely high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet/wristlet definitely exceeded my expectations. Beautiful and flawless, looks high end because the leather is not too shiny and the logo is not too big. Perfect size to fit everything you need (the length is of a dollar bill), many compartments for cards, bills and coins. If you’re not sure, JUST GET IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks better than the actual item. I bought it as a stocking stuffer for Christmas, and upon close examination of this “wallet”, I realized that I’d be embarrassed to give it as a gift, because of poor quality and material.
customer_reviews.author: G.E.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!!! Don’t Waste Your $
customer_reviews.text: If you have a cell phone, you’ll need to remove it from its protective case or else it won’t fit in the wallet. So don’t drop your phone! Also, boarding passes do not fit in the slots. If the wallet was an 1 1/2” longer and 1” wider this would solve the design flaw. But I find this wallet worthless and not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I only purchased this for a traveling, but it ended up replacing my regular wallet! I've been using it regularly for about 3 months and it doesn't show any signs of wear. It was a tight fit, but I was able to fit 2 passports, paper currency, a pen, several cards, and my cell phone in a slim case without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product. It was described as holding a phone, and many cards. But, I was unable to snap it closed with my cards and phone inside. It was beautiful, and sturdy looking, but if you want to put your phone or a number of cards in it, you might look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy River

customer_reviews.title: Just as image shows
customer_reviews.text: This is great for travel. I got the metallic light purple and the color is exactly what I expected. Big enough to fit my travel essentials including my phone. I was looking for one wallet to hold everything and this works- and there is a place for a pen. I am not sure how durable it will be- but time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E

customer_reviews.title: Slippery and awkward to carry
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but will probably return. The material is very slippery ( don’t mind if not leather as waterproof) and I think I would drop it. Also the wallet is an awkward size. Bigger then a wallet but smaller then a purse. The band to put around your wrist is also too large.
customer_reviews.author: Ameigh Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Great travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wallet I have it in the green and the rose gold both are great quality. They feel like they will last a long time and there’s a lot of sections that make it very functional. Can fit a passport, boarding passes and everything I normally carry in my wallet on top of that! 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Niceeeeee!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for traveling abroad. It worked great and was cute. There's hideaway areas that I could easily grab money without showing how much was in there. I'm going to use this as an everyday wallet now that the trip is over.
customer_reviews.author: Kisha

customer_reviews.title: So convenient for traveling, pretty, affordable, and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I chose the brown color and it’s really pretty. It looks very chic, and can fit my tickets and passport well. You can also add other items, and there’s a pocket with a zipper which you could possibly add money in. The customer service of this company is great and responds within one day or less! I originally recieved the last version as a gift, and inside was a scratch off card in which I won. I contacted the company and they were very nice to let me choose this one as a prize. Overall I really recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for trips.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my trip to Mexico. Traveling through 2 airports, I didn’t have to worry about keeping up with a purse, wallet, passport, etc. my mom got one as well and loved it. Will definitely be my go to travel wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wallet for Moms
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet and I highly recommend it. It holds all your essentials for travel. I most especially love the fact that it has space for cell phone and pen - need pen to complete custom forms for international flight. As a mom on the go, I absolutely love that I don'have to be looking for out flight details and get money out for food while juggling kid and bags. Go get yours now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to hold my passport, credit card and case. My phone fits inside if it is in a thin case. Very stylish and looks good as a clutch purse. I may have to order another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyeTx

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have been using it as a wallet in my purse for day time and a wristlet for when I go out. I have an iPhone 6 and it fits in the inside pocket. The material is super durable but also sleek and cute, I have the black one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Walls

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip but ended up liking it so much I now use it every day. Great organization for all of my cards and cash! On the trip, I was able to keep my passport and money in one important place. The only reason I’m giving 4 stars is that sometimes the closure will pop open if the wallet is jostling around in my bag or something. However, everything is so secure inside I’ve never had anything fall out
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Secured travel
customer_reviews.text: I like it because when we were traveling I really felt that my information was protected. I also liked that it was all in one location. I did not feel that you could put all that it showing the picture. I couldn’t put my phone in it so I had to carry a purse too.
customer_reviews.author: karren

customer_reviews.title: It’s FLAT & WIDE!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it in the mail today & so far I like it! Not only can you use this when traveling, you can also use it when out with family & friends. Excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Solid travel wallet with plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: I have the Zoppen RFID Travel Passport Wallet (see pic) which I’ve been very pleased with, so I suggested this one for my wife. She really likes the sleek, clean, and compact design. She’s also happy that it has tons of room to hold a lot of cards, passport, cash, and even her iphone...along with the removable wrist strap. I like that it has Rfid blocking. It’s great for travelling, and she would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the was this looks and the organization. However, you get what you pay for. Mine is already starting to fall apart at the corners.It was nice while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: JessB

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for myself and another for my best friend. We just used them on a trip and they were very helpful with having everything organized and in one place. This is slim and doesn’t take up much space at all. However, I used the cell phone pouch for all of my cash, not a cell phone. The pen holder was especially helpful, since I didn’t have to scramble around to find a pen to fill out my customs forms.
customer_reviews.author: EricaWVU

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my sister for Christmas and she loved it. The quality is great and looks the same in person as the pictures. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B.Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: This was a great travel wallet. Held 2 passports, a few credit cards and money very nicely. It is very nice looking and could be used as an everyday wallet (if I didn’t like my regular wallet so much, I might just use it every day). Would highly recommend when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Lakegirl 88

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd wallet. I love them. I had ordered the wrong color previously (my fault not paying attention) and it didn’t have a wrist strap. I ordered the black wallet and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Thriftshop331

customer_reviews.title: Large case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace my current passport book and I liked the look of this one. It is much larger than I thought it would be, it is almost like a small purse. It has a ton of space for things, but it is not quite what I was looking for/wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy yet small enough to not be heavy or burdensome. Just got back from a cruise, this was perfect for carrying just what I needed without having to lug around a bothersome purse.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda J. King

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister's birthday, and I think I might buy one for myself. It fits iPhone X well without the Otterbox case (which is incredibly bulky). The medium brown shade looks good, but I wish it came in a lighter brown shade (hazelnut) like version 4 because this shade is a bit too similar to my MK purse. I don't know how long it lasts; I'm sure you pay for what you get. However, I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Solo Travelers
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a solo trip around Italy and used this as my main way of carrying important items on the daily. Many friends warned me about pickpocketting in Europe and I'm happy to report I had absolutely no issues with that while using this wallet. I was able to secure all my important documents and even fit my phone in one of the pockets. The design is simplistic and functional. Highly recommend to anyone for hassle free travelling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a mini clutch
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this wallet not just for traveling, but also when going out when I don't want to carry a purse. It fits everything important: my phone (Samsung S7 in Otterbox case), cash, cards, keys (just flat without a key chain). It looks stylish, and because of the strap I can carry it around my wrist and keep my hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today and I'm very happy with the quality for the price. I returned another one because a SIM card holder was shown but it did not have one. I love the color (I think called gold brown?) It blends nicely with the RFID fabric inside.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it looks just like the olive green wallet in the picture. All the pockets are tight and secure. the color of the wallet is rich and appealing. I'm so happy I picked the color I chose and the wallet seems like it will be there for you for a long time. So, grateful for such a quality wallet for such a price. Thank you, Jesus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Work!
customer_reviews.text: Tested this many ways, it is NOT RFID protection. It's bull crap, kitchen aluminium foil worked and this did not, absolutely crap and false advertising! Do NOT buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Fashionable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good and sturdy wallet. I took this on a 3 week trip to Australia. I bought it because it also holds my passport and all my cards as well as a lot of room for cash. Both Australian and American cash. I sometimes also used it as a clutch, but kept my passport in the hotel safe. Initially heard about the wallet from a Travel blogger. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelers !
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is better than I expected! Appearance wise: the maroon color is so rich, it’s well made, and the snap is definitely sturdy ! I love the organizational slots inside of the wallet. This wallet is perfect for my traveling needs
customer_reviews.author: Yaritza

customer_reviews.title: A place for everything
customer_reviews.text: This travel wallet held everything I needed if I went someplace for the evening and didn’t want or need to take my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jo B.

customer_reviews.title: Great design and convenience
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the wallet and the color is also my favorite. It’s very practical and can hold 6-8 bank/credit cards, has a pen holder, latchkey, phone, or bill and also passports. Such the design and construction is the best choice for travel and daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Valued Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE REVIEWS ARE TRUE! Get this wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This was PERFECT for my 14 day trip to Hawaii. It made having everything I needed a breeze and I actually always knew where a pen was (which was a first for me). I love this wallet so much, it was single handedly the biggest lifesaver on my trip. Everything from money to your passport to boarding passes fit in this wallet. The hardest part was choosing a color, but I went with the rose golde and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dial

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of things. Very nice color and very soft. Looks like an expensive item. I was not able to fit my phone In the holder for the phone. My cover must be a little too large. Had my phone fit, I would have rated 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Crysel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, classy looking, quality product! Not large enough for my iPhone that I purchased it for!
customer_reviews.text: Not enough room for my phone which I purchased it for. Could fit all travel documents easily! Great quality and very classy looking! Have received several compliments! Durable! Still use it as a regular billfold
customer_reviews.author: Micheala Lee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a cruise. This was perfect! Held our 2 passports as well as cash, cards, a pen and I still had room. The quality is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lexilex

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: Loop to carry wallet broke off within the second day of using it. Poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Borsellino

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the price and quality of my wallet. It is very slim and I hope it will last as long as possible. All my cards and money fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for travel
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a travel purse to carry passport and funds. I also wanted something bright so that I didn't accidentally left it somewhere. It is easy to carry and served the purpose well. The construction isn't all that great, but for the price it was an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: KKMarietta

customer_reviews.title: Held everything perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten compliments on this. After our trip I just kept using it, though the main reason I bought it was it holds my passport. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Functional but the quality of materials used for this wallet do not seem as nice and durable as the photos may look. Has a flimsy feel but for the price and short term usage then it would serve it's purpose decently.
customer_reviews.author: KNTX

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had a different Zoppen product, the small passport holder and love the quality. I used it to travel abroad and realized that I would need a large one that would hold my passport and other cards. I have yet to actually travel with it, but I love the color and material which is equal quality and the small holder that I have. I'm excited for COVID19 to be over so I can start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Parker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold as must as I imagined
customer_reviews.text: It's a good concept however, it couldn't hold everything I needed so I still had to walk with a purse. This only held passport, pen and some bills.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Won’t close easily with all items as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited when I received it , looks great but doesn’t fit everything as pictured. Once I placed items as in picture it was difficult to close and once closed it looked like it was ready to pop open. I could fit my IPhone X but once inside it’s hard to get money out from zippered compartment. It’s a good price but just out of the bag the corner seams are already coming apart. I really wanted to keep this but sadly will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice travel wallet but I have been using it since I got it and everyone loves it
customer_reviews.author: Hwilli79997

customer_reviews.title: Fit 1 passport only
customer_reviews.text: Wish it could fit two passports it could only fit one but it’s a nice material and size clutch
customer_reviews.author: Cryss

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Its great, fits lots of stuff and very convenient. I bought one as a gift as well and the recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie deJesus

customer_reviews.title: Found the Perfect Wallet, Finally!
customer_reviews.text: This might be my favorite wallet I’ve owned. Looks way more expensive. Perfect size for my cards, cash, iPhone X, and passport. 100% chance I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wallet to use during my travels to protect my credit card numbers and hold other ‘stuff’. However, once the wallet arrived, I was very pleasantly surprised at the quality. It looks like a much more expensive wallet than it is. It can be used for regular daily use and not just for travel. It holds everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: C. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: Used this week in my travels, put everything I needed for my trip to Mexico in just one place! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That all my credit cards etc were protected
customer_reviews.text: The Zoppen passport holder came in very handy for airline travel. Room to keep tickets, IDs, and phone readily accessible thru the lines. I like the wrist strap for securing it to your wrist Incase of a fumble.
customer_reviews.author: Judy R. Layman

customer_reviews.title: True to description but looks cheaper and lower quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to have a wallet with RFID while traveling. It arrived and fits the description, but looks cheaper and is much more stiff than I expected. I ended up using another wallet for the intended trip, but decided to hold onto this to give it a try in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

product_meta.title: Zoppen Passport Holder Travel Wallet (Ver.5) for Women Rfid Blocking Multi-purpose Passport Cover Case Document Organizer Wrist Strap
product_meta.description:
Zoppen Passport Holder Travel Wallet for Women Rfid Blocking Multi-purpose - Ver.5

Many customers loved Zoppen passport wallet Ver.4 and suggested that wallet would have a removable wrist strip. 

We appreciate all of you loving Zoppen products and cherish your suggestion, now we released the travel wallet Ver.5 

Compared with wallet Ver.4, there are 2 difference for wallet Ver.5: 

Has a detachable wristlet strap to make more convenience

Could hold cell phone with max 154 x 77 x 7.7mm, iphone X fits easily with no bulky


Product Specific: 

* Eco-friendly material: High quality PU leather - passed Euro REACH Quality Standard, US EN71 and US CA Prop 65 Test

* Safety: Rfid blocking material inside to protect your personal information

* Measurement : 7.75" x 5.0" x 1.0" inches ( 19.6 x 12.5 x 2.5 cm ) 

* Roomy: 1 x Passport pouch, 7 x Card slots, 1 x ID slot, 1 x ticket compartment

1 x Cell phone pouch, 1 x Zipper pocket, 1 x Sim card slot, 1 x Pen holder, 1 x key ring

* More functional: Fit U.S.passport, U.S. money and 5.8" Smartphone (max) 

* Comfort: more sponge added makes clutch getting better touch feel


For travellers, travel is meant to be enjoyable so staying organized is one of the most important thing on a trip. 

An organized passport wallet keeps all your travel documents, credit cards, cash, changes, keys, pen in one place. 

Zoppen travel wallet is the perfect one you need! It is excellent quality, cute design, functional for storage

fits inside a women's tote bag or backpack comfortable. It also can act as a fun purse because of its shape of a clutch. 

Choose the color to match the rest of your carry-on luggage set, enjoy a wonderful trip!
feature_bullets: Convenience for Travelling - Zoppen travel wallet Ver.5 designed with a detachable wristlet strap, you could hold the wallet on hand more convenience when navigating the airport. The strap is 8" long, fits your wrist comfortable and keep the wallet more secure from thieves.

Security for Travelling - Not only the strap keeps safe, but also the Rfid blocking protects your credit cards, debit cards and bills from scanning by a wireless Rfid reader that under frequency 13.56 Mhz, no worry on your vacation.

Priority for Travelling - The wallet is made from high quality ECO-Friendly PU leather, passed Euro REACH Quality Standard, US EN71 and US CA Prop 65 Test. Soft touch, durable, easy for carrying and going to hold up through your whole trips!

Easy for Storing - 7 credit card slots, 1 ID slot, 1 SIM slot, 1 boarding pass pocket, 1 pen holder, 1 key ring, 1 pocket for passport(can hold 2), 1 zipper pocket for few cash and coins, 1 cell phone pouch for smartphone with max 154 x 77 x 7.7mm, keeping things organized but still close easily.

Gifts for Traveller Friends - Lovely gifts for yourself, your friends, your family or relatives who loving traveling. It is also a great gift for company employees and clients. Bulk purchase please contact Zoppen customer service, you could get a best price!
